name: Horsegiirl
description: '''HorsegiirL''' is a [[Pseudonym|pseudonymous]] German DJ, singer, and songwriter who hides her identity behind a [[horse head mask]]. Her 2023 single "My Barn My Rules", which became a popular sound on [[TikTok]], attracted attention after [[Arielle Free]] was suspended from [[BBC Radio 1]] for a week for decrying it on air, and later appeared on ''[[Dazed]]''{{'}}s "20 best tracks of 2023" list.
